reference.title: Version and support information
reference.shortdesc: You can use these extension points to define version and support information for a plug-in. Currently, DITA-OT does not do anything with this information, but it might do so in the future.

dlentry.dd: Specifies the person who provides support for the DITA-OT plug-in.
Specifies the e-mail address of the person who provides support for the DITA-OT plug-in.
Specifies the version of the DITA-OT plug-in.

dd.p: The value uses the following syntax:

ul.li: major is a number and is required.
minor is a number and is optional.
micro is a number and is optional.
qualifier is optional and can be composed of numerals, uppercase or lower case letters, underscores, and hyphens.

dd.p: By default, the package.version value is set to 0.0.0.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <plugin id="com.example.WithSupportInfo"> <feature extension="package.support.name" value="Joe the Author"/> <feature extension="package.support.email" value="joe@example.com"/> <feature extension="package.version" value="1.2.3"/> </plugin>
